T02D2555:21a-0: @21a * // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2555:21a-1: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa ni /
T02D2555:21a-2: dang po bdag nyid kyis sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas thob par bya'o zhes bsam /
T02D2555:21a-3: de nas aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ae aee
T02D2555:21a-4: ao aoo aam aa: zhes pas stong pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2555:21a-5: las rang gi sems kyi snang ba a'a li k'a
T02D2555:21a-6: lir bsam pa'i 'od zer gyis rten gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2555:21a-8: de'i dbus su seng ge'i khri nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsam pa ni /
T02D2555:21a-9: sthi to hri di dzny'a na ma m'u rtti ra ham bu ddho bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2555:21a-10: trya dhva bartti n'am zhes brjod pas rnam snang chen po kun du zhal bsam mo //
T02D2555:21a-11: de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsam /
T02D2555:21a-12: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgoms te /
T02D2555:21a-13: aom badzra t'i kashna ya te na ma: aom du: khatstshe da ya te na ma:/
T02D2555:21a-14: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'u rtt'a ya te na
T02D2555:21a-15: ma: aom dzny'a na k'a ya te na ma: aom
T02D2555:21a-16: wa g'i shva r'a ya te na m'a:/
T02D2555:21a-17: aom aa ra pa tsa n'a ya te na ma:
T02D2555:21a-18: zhes brjod bas shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa
T02D2555:21a-19: bsgom / de'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' zla ba dang aa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2555:21a-20: aa'i 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor drug bdag la zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2555:21a-21: de la mtshan brjod par bya'o //
T02D2555:21a-22: de la dang por byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan brjod par bya ste /
T02D2555:21a-25: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog //
T02D2555:21a-26: ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu bzhi brjod pas /
T02D2555:21b-0: ye shes sems @21b dpa'i yi ge aa las mtshan don byung ste /
T02D2555:21b-1: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su gyur te /
T02D2555:21b-2: spros nas 'gro ba sems can gyi don byas nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2555:21b-3: rnam snang chen po'i phyi rim du gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2555:21b-5: sangs rgyas rnam par mdzad che //
T02D2555:21b-6: zhes pa nas rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2555:21b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa
T02D2555:21b-8: lngar rkang pa gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod pas
T02D2555:21b-9: / thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i aa las mtshan
T02D2555:21b-10: don gyi yi ge brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'phros
T02D2555:21b-11: / te / de dag kyang rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs su gyur te /
T02D2555:21b-12: 'gro ba'i don byas rnam par snang mdzad chen po la bskor bar bsam mo /
T02D2555:21b-14: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed nas /
T02D2555:21b-15: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa'i
T02D2555:21b-16: bar du tshigs bcad bcur rkang pa gcig gis lhag
T02D2555:21b-17: pa brjod pas / ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i
T02D2555:21b-18: aa las mtshan don gyi yi ge rnams spros pas
T02D2555:21b-19: 'jig rten gyi gdug pa can rnams btul nas dkyil
T02D2555:21b-20: 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su 'khor par bzhugs par
T02D2555:21b-21: pa brjod pas / bsam mo // de nas /
T02D2555:21b-22: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid nas //
T02D2555:21b-23: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
T02D2555:21b-24: zhes pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brjod pas /
T02D2555:21b-25: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge aa las
T02D2555:21b-26: mtshan don gyi yi ge nyis brgya sum cu rtsa
T02D2555:21b-28: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2555:21b-29: sprul pas 'gro don byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i
T02D2555:21b-30: nub phyogs su bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2555:21b-32: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02D2555:21b-34: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / ces pa'i
T02D2555:21b-35: bar gyis tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D2555:21b-36: brjod pas / ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa
T02D2555:21b-37: las mtshan don gyi yi ge brgya nyi shu rtsa
T02D2555:21b-38: brjod pas / bzhi spros te / sangs rgyas rin
T02D2555:21b-39: chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprul pas 'gro
T02D2555:21b-40: ba'i don byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho phyogs
T02D2555:21b-43: sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba //
T02D2555:22a-2: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa'i
T02D2555:22a-3: bar du tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga brjod pas
T02D2555:22a-4: / ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las mtshan don dgu bcu rtsa dgu spros te /
T02D2555:22a-5: sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprul
T02D2555:22a-6: pas sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su grub par
T02D2555:22a-7: byas nas slar 'dus te dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang
T02D2555:22a-8: phyogs su bzhugs par bsgom mo //
T02D2555:22a-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po drug po de las /
T02D2555:22a-11: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / ces pa
T02D2555:22a-12: la sogs pas bstod cing mchod par bsams la gdon
T02D2555:22a-13: to // de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po de la spyir 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod do //
T02D2555:22a-14: de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D2555:22a-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngos te /
T02D2555:22a-16: aom sva bh'a ba'i sngags kyis chos thams cad rang
T02D2555:22a-17: bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing spros pa dang bral
T02D2555:22a-18: bar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ngo bo nam mkha' ltar
T02D2555:22a-19: dri ma med par yongs su dag par bsgoms te
T02D2555:22a-20: spyod lam gyi bya ba gzhan bya'o //
T02D2555:22a-21: de ltar rigs bsdus pa'i dbang du byas nas mtshan
T02D2555:22a-22: brjod cing bsdus pa la tshigs bcad nyis brgya drug
T02D2555:22a-23: cu rtsa gnyis kyis bstan to //
T02D2555:22a-24: de'i yon tan gyi gzhung tshigs bcad brgya lnga bcu'o //
T02D2555:22a-25: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod pa yon tan dang bcas pa'o //
